content.raw: I wonder if setting the force on the propellers has an impact on the dynamics of the boat. Now we have the force / torque being applied on the body from the OnCmdDrive function and to the propellers. I think ideally we would just set forces on the propellers and let gazebo simulate the effects this has on the whole boat.
content.html: I wonder if setting the force on the propellers has an impact on the dynamics of the boat. Now we have the force / torque being applied on the body from the OnCmdDrive function and to the propellers. I think ideally we would just set forces on the propellers and let gazebo simulate the effects this has on the whole boat.
